topics.definition: Sweet and edible product of a tree or plant containing seeds.
topics.example: I enjoy eating fresh fruits like apples and bananas.

topics.definition: Plant or part of a plant used as food, typically savory.
topics.example: We cook a variety of vegetables such as carrots, broccoli, and peas.
Water is a healthy beverage choice.

topics.definition: Small amount of food eaten between meals.
topics.example: I like to have a snack of popcorn while watching movies.
This curry dish is very spicy!

topics.definition: Very tasty and enjoyable to eat.
topics.example: The cake she baked was absolutely delicious.

topics.definition: Food that is firm and makes a crunching sound when bitten.
topics.example: I prefer my fries to be crispy.
After playing outside, I felt thirsty and drank a glass of water.
After school, the children were very hungry.

topics.definition: Food that provides necessary substances for growth and health.
topics.example: Salads are nutritious because they have lots of vitamins and minerals.

topics.text: Sarah loved cooking. One day, she decided to make a special dinner. She chopped fresh vegetables and grilled chicken. She made a delicious salad with crispy lettuce and juicy tomatoes. For dessert, she baked a fruit pie using apples and cherries from her garden. Her friends came over, and they all enjoyed the meal together.

topics.definition: Something that is very easy to do.
topics.example: Don't worry, fixing this issue will be a piece of cake.

topics.definition: A traditional British dish consisting of battered and fried fish served with deep-fried potatoes.
topics.example: I'm craving some fish and chips for dinner.
